Desc.entry: Nursing and residential home for people aged 55 years and over with enduring functional mental health problems. Provides personal care to 16 residents and nursing care to 25 residents. Owned by Anchor Trust. This care home is registered and inspected by the Care Quality Commission (CQC), to make sure they provide a quality service.

ContactName.entry: Rachel Sleney, Business Manager/Maggie Astle, Care Manager

category.entry: CARE HOMES FOR OLDER PEOPLE (RESIDENTIAL HOMES)
CARE HOMES WITH NURSING FOR OLDER PEOPLE (NURSING HOMES)
